verse.name: Colossians 1:1
verse.Greek: Παῦλος ἀπόστολος Χριστοῦ Ἰησοῦ διὰ θελήματος Θεοῦ καὶ Τιμόθεος ὁ ἀδελφὸς
verse.ULB: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother,
verse.residue: , an of through the , and our ,

verse.name: Colossians 1:2
verse.Greek: Τοῖς ἐν Κολοσσαῖς ἁγίοις καὶ πιστοῖς ἀδελφοῖς ἐν Χριστῷ Χάρις ὑμῖν καὶ εἰρήνη ἀπὸ Θεοῦ Πατρὸς ἡμῶν
verse.ULB: to God's holy people and faithful brothers in Christ who are at Colossae. May grace be to you, and peace from God our Father. \f + \ft Some important and ancient Greek copies add, \fqa and the Lord Jesus Christ \fqa* . \f*
verse.residue: to people and in Christ who are at . May be to you, and from God our .
verse.usfm: \f + \ft Some important and ancient Greek copies add, \fqa and the Lord Jesus Christ \fqa* . \f*

verse.name: Colossians 1:3
verse.Greek: Εὐχαριστοῦμεν τῷ Θεῷ Πατρὶ τοῦ Κυρίου ἡμῶν Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ πάντοτε περὶ ὑμῶν προσευχόμενοι
verse.ULB: We give thanks to God, the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, and we always pray for you.
verse.residue: We give thanks to , the of our , and we always for you.

verse.name: Colossians 1:4
verse.Greek: ἀκούσαντες τὴν πίστιν ὑμῶν ἐν Χριστῷ Ἰησοῦ καὶ τὴν ἀγάπην ἣν ἔχετε εἰς πάντας τοὺς ἁγίους
verse.ULB: We have heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of the love that you have for all God's holy people,
verse.residue: We have of your and of the that you have for all God's people,

verse.name: Colossians 1:5
verse.Greek: διὰ τὴν ἐλπίδα τὴν ἀποκειμένην ὑμῖν ἐν τοῖς οὐρανοῖς ἣν προηκούσατε ἐν τῷ λόγῳ τῆς ἀληθείας τοῦ εὐαγγελίου
verse.ULB: because of the hope reserved for you in heaven, which you heard about in the word of truth, the gospel
verse.residue: because of the for you in heaven, which you heard about in the , the

verse.name: Colossians 1:6
verse.Greek: τοῦ παρόντος εἰς ὑμᾶς καθὼς καὶ ἐν παντὶ τῷ κόσμῳ ἐστὶν καρποφορούμενον καὶ αὐξανόμενον καθὼς καὶ ἐν ὑμῖν ἀφ᾽ ἧς ἡμέρας ἠκούσατε καὶ ἐπέγνωτε τὴν χάριν τοῦ Θεοῦ ἐν ἀληθείᾳ
verse.ULB: which has come to you. In the same way this gospel is bearing fruit and is growing in all the world—just has it been doing among you since the day you heard it and understood the grace of God in truth.
verse.residue: which has come to you. In this gospel is fruit and is growing in all the —just has it been doing among you since the you heard it and the of in .

verse.name: Colossians 1:7
verse.Greek: καθὼς ἐμάθετε ἀπὸ Ἐπαφρᾶ τοῦ ἀγαπητοῦ συνδούλου ἡμῶν ὅς ἐστιν πιστὸς ὑπὲρ ἡμῶν διάκονος τοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: This is the gospel as you learned it from Epaphras, our beloved fellow servant, who is a faithful servant of Christ on our behalf. \f + \ft Some important and ancient Greek copies read, \fqa on your behalf \fqa* . \f*
verse.residue: This is the gospel you learned it from Epaphras, our fellow , who is a servant of on our behalf.
verse.usfm: \f + \ft Some important and ancient Greek copies read, \fqa on your behalf \fqa* . \f*

verse.name: Colossians 1:8
verse.Greek: ὁ καὶ δηλώσας ἡμῖν τὴν ὑμῶν ἀγάπην ἐν Πνεύματι
verse.ULB: Epaphras has made known to us your love in the Spirit.
verse.residue: Epaphras has made known to us your in the .

verse.name: Colossians 1:9
verse.Greek: Διὰ τοῦτο καὶ ἡμεῖς ἀφ᾽ ἧς ἡμέρας ἠκούσαμεν οὐ παυόμεθα ὑπὲρ ὑμῶν προσευχόμενοι καὶ αἰτούμενοι ἵνα πληρωθῆτε τὴν ἐπίγνωσιν τοῦ θελήματος αὐτοῦ ἐν πάσῃ σοφίᾳ καὶ συνέσει πνευματικῇ
verse.ULB: Because of this love, from the day we heard this we have not stopped praying for you. We pray that you will be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding,
verse.residue: Because of this love, from the we heard this we have not stopped for you. We that you will be filled with the of in all and ,

verse.name: Colossians 1:10
verse.Greek: περιπατῆσαι ἀξίως τοῦ Κυρίου εἰς πᾶσαν ἀρεσκείαν ἐν παντὶ ἔργῳ ἀγαθῷ καρποφοροῦντες καὶ αὐξανόμενοι τῇ ἐπιγνώσει τοῦ Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: so that you will walk in a manner that is worthy of the Lord and that pleases him in every way: by bearing fruit in every good work and growing in the knowledge of God,
verse.residue: so that you will in a manner that is of the and that pleases him in every way: by fruit in every and growing in the of ,
verse.w: in a manner that is worthy

verse.name: Colossians 1:11
verse.Greek: ἐν πάσῃ δυνάμει δυναμούμενοι κατὰ τὸ κράτος τῆς δόξης αὐτοῦ εἰς πᾶσαν ὑπομονὴν καὶ μακροθυμίαν μετὰ χαρᾶς
verse.ULB: by being strengthened with all power, according to his glorious might, so that you may have great endurance and patience, and by joyfully
verse.residue: by being with all , according to his might, so that you may have great and , and by
verse.w: so that you may have great

verse.name: Colossians 1:12
verse.Greek: εὐχαριστοῦντες τῷ Πατρὶ τῷ ἱκανώσαντι ὑμᾶς εἰς τὴν μερίδα τοῦ κλήρου τῶν ἁγίων ἐν τῷ φωτί
verse.ULB: giving thanks to the Father, who made you able \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa who made us able \fqa* . \f* to have a share in the inheritance of God's holy people in light.
verse.residue: giving thanks to the , who made you able to have a share in the of God's people in .
verse.usfm: \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa who made us able \fqa* . \f*

verse.name: Colossians 1:13
verse.Greek: ὃς ἐρρύσατο ἡμᾶς ἐκ τῆς ἐξουσίας τοῦ σκότους καὶ μετέστησεν εἰς τὴν βασιλείαν τοῦ Υἱοῦ τῆς ἀγάπης αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: He has rescued us from the dominion of darkness and transferred us to the kingdom of his beloved Son,
verse.residue: He has us from the of and transferred us to the of his Son,

verse.name: Colossians 1:14
verse.Greek: ἐν ᾧ ἔχομεν τὴν ἀπολύτρωσιν τὴν ἄφεσιν τῶν ἁμαρτιῶν
verse.ULB: in whom we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins. \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa in whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins \fqa* , it may be a reference to Ephesians 1:7. \f*
verse.residue: in whom we have , the of .
verse.usfm: \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa in whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins \fqa* , it may be a reference to Ephesians 1:7. \f*

verse.name: Colossians 1:15
verse.Greek: Ὅς ἐστιν εἰκὼν τοῦ Θεοῦ τοῦ ἀοράτου πρωτότοκος πάσης κτίσεως
verse.ULB: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation.
verse.residue: He is the of the invisible , the of all .

verse.name: Colossians 1:16
verse.Greek: ὅτι ἐν αὐτῷ ἐκτίσθη τὰ πάντα ἐν τοῖς οὐρανοῖς καὶ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς τὰ ὁρατὰ καὶ τὰ ἀόρατα εἴτε θρόνοι εἴτε κυριότητες εἴτε ἀρχαὶ εἴτε ἐξουσίαι τὰ πάντα δι᾽ αὐτοῦ καὶ εἰς αὐτὸν ἔκτισται
verse.ULB: For in him all things were created, those in the heavens and those on the earth, the visible and the invisible things. Whether thrones or dominions or governments or authorities, all things were created through him and for him.
verse.residue: For in him all things were , those in the heavens and those on the , the visible and the invisible things. Whether or or or , all things were through him and for him.

verse.name: Colossians 1:17
verse.Greek: Καὶ αὐτός ἐστιν πρὸ πάντων καὶ τὰ πάντα ἐν αὐτῷ συνέστηκεν
verse.ULB: He himself is before all things, and in him all things hold together.
verse.residue: He himself is before all things, and in him all things hold together.

verse.name: Colossians 1:18
verse.Greek: καὶ αὐτός ἐστιν ἡ κεφαλὴ τοῦ σώματος τῆς ἐκκλησίας ὅς ἐστιν ἀρχή πρωτότοκος ἐκ τῶν νεκρῶν ἵνα γένηται ἐν πᾶσιν αὐτὸς πρωτεύων
verse.ULB: He is the head of the body, the church. He is the beginning, the firstborn from among the dead, so he has first place among all things.
verse.residue: He is the of the , the . He is the beginning, the from among the , so he has first place among all things.

verse.name: Colossians 1:19
verse.Greek: ὅτι ἐν αὐτῷ εὐδόκησεν πᾶν τὸ πλήρωμα κατοικῆσαι
verse.ULB: For God was pleased to have all his fullness dwell in the Son,
verse.residue: For God was that all his fullness should live in him,

verse.name: Colossians 1:20
verse.Greek: καὶ δι᾽ αὐτοῦ ἀποκαταλλάξαι τὰ πάντα εἰς αὐτόν εἰρηνοποιήσας διὰ τοῦ αἵματος τοῦ σταυροῦ αὐτοῦ δι᾽ αὐτοῦ εἴτε τὰ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς εἴτε τὰ ἐν τοῖς οὐρανοῖς
verse.ULB: and through the Son to reconcile all things to himself, having made peace through the blood of his cross, whether things on earth or things in heaven.
verse.residue: and to reconcile through the Son all things to himself. God made through the of his . God all things to himself, whether the things on the or the things in heaven.

verse.name: Colossians 1:21
verse.Greek: Καὶ ὑμᾶς ποτε ὄντας ἀπηλλοτριωμένους καὶ ἐχθροὺς τῇ διανοίᾳ ἐν τοῖς ἔργοις τοῖς πονηροῖς
verse.ULB: At one time you also were alienated and hostile in mind and in evil deeds.
verse.residue: At one you also were and in and in .

verse.name: Colossians 1:22
verse.Greek: νυνὶ δὲ ἀποκατήλλαξεν ἐν τῷ σώματι τῆς σαρκὸς αὐτοῦ διὰ τοῦ θανάτου παραστῆσαι ὑμᾶς ἁγίους καὶ ἀμώμους καὶ ἀνεγκλήτους κατενώπιον αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: But now he has reconciled you by his physical body through death. He did this in order to present you holy, blameless and above accusation—
verse.residue: But now he has you by his through . He did this in order to present you , and above accusation—

verse.name: Colossians 1:23
verse.Greek: εἴ γε ἐπιμένετε τῇ πίστει τεθεμελιωμένοι καὶ ἑδραῖοι καὶ μὴ μετακινούμενοι ἀπὸ τῆς ἐλπίδος τοῦ εὐαγγελίου οὗ ἠκούσατε τοῦ κηρυχθέντος ἐν πάσῃ κτίσει τῇ ὑπὸ τὸν οὐρανόν οὗ ἐγενόμην ἐγὼ Παῦλος διάκονος
verse.ULB: if you continue in the faith, established and firm, not moved away from the hope of the gospel that you heard, which was proclaimed to every person created under heaven. This is the gospel of which I, Paul, became a servant.
verse.residue: if you continue in the , and firm, not moved away from the of the that you , which was to every person under heaven. This is the gospel of which I, , became a .

verse.name: Colossians 1:24
verse.Greek: Νῦν χαίρω ἐν τοῖς παθήμασιν ὑπὲρ ὑμῶν καὶ ἀνταναπληρῶ τὰ ὑστερήματα τῶν θλίψεων τοῦ Χριστοῦ ἐν τῇ σαρκί μου ὑπὲρ τοῦ σώματος αὐτοῦ ὅ ἐστιν ἡ ἐκκλησία
verse.ULB: Now I rejoice in my sufferings for you, and I fill up in my flesh what is lacking of the afflictions of Christ for the sake of his body, which is the church.
verse.residue: Now I in my for you, and I fill up in my what is lacking of the of for the sake of his , which is the .

verse.name: Colossians 1:25
verse.Greek: ἧς ἐγενόμην ἐγὼ διάκονος κατὰ τὴν οἰκονομίαν τοῦ Θεοῦ τὴν δοθεῖσάν μοι εἰς ὑμᾶς πληρῶσαι τὸν λόγον τοῦ Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: It is of this church that I am a servant, according to the stewardship from God that was given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God.
verse.residue: It is of this church that I am a , according to the from that was given to me for you, to the .

verse.name: Colossians 1:26
verse.Greek: τὸ μυστήριον τὸ ἀποκεκρυμμένον ἀπὸ τῶν αἰώνων καὶ ἀπὸ τῶν γενεῶν νῦν δὲ ἐφανερώθη τοῖς ἁγίοις αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: This is the mystery that was hidden for ages and for generations but now has been revealed to God's holy people.
verse.residue: This is the that was hidden for and for but now has been to God's people.

verse.name: Colossians 1:27
verse.Greek: οἷς ἠθέλησεν ὁ Θεὸς γνωρίσαι τί τὸ πλοῦτος τῆς δόξης τοῦ μυστηρίου τούτου ἐν τοῖς ἔθνεσιν ὅ ἐστιν Χριστὸς ἐν ὑμῖν ἡ ἐλπὶς τῆς δόξης
verse.ULB: It is to them that God wanted to make known the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
verse.residue: It is to them that wanted to the riches of the of this among the Gentiles, which is in you, the of .

verse.name: Colossians 1:28
verse.Greek: ὃν ἡμεῖς καταγγέλλομεν νουθετοῦντες πάντα ἄνθρωπον καὶ διδάσκοντες πάντα ἄνθρωπον ἐν πάσῃ σοφίᾳ ἵνα παραστήσωμεν πάντα ἄνθρωπον τέλειον ἐν Χριστῷ
verse.ULB: We proclaim him, warning and teaching everyone with all wisdom, so that we may present every person mature in Christ.
verse.residue: We proclaim him, and everyone with all , so that we may present every person mature .

verse.name: Colossians 1:29
verse.Greek: Εἰς ὃ καὶ κοπιῶ ἀγωνιζόμενος κατὰ τὴν ἐνέργειαν αὐτοῦ τὴν ἐνεργουμένην ἐν ἐμοὶ ἐν δυνάμει
verse.ULB: For this I labor and strive according to his energy that is at work in me in power.
verse.residue: For this I and according to his energy that is at work in me in .

verse.name: Colossians 2:1
verse.Greek: Θέλω γὰρ ὑμᾶς εἰδέναι ἡλίκον ἀγῶνα ἔχω ὑπὲρ ὑμῶν καὶ τῶν ἐν Λαοδικείᾳ καὶ ὅσοι οὐχ ἑόρακαν τὸ πρόσωπόν μου ἐν σαρκί
verse.ULB: For I want you to know how great a struggle I have had for you, for those at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh.
verse.residue: For I want you to how great a struggle I have had for you, for those at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my in the .

verse.name: Colossians 2:2
verse.Greek: ἵνα παρακληθῶσιν αἱ καρδίαι αὐτῶν συμβιβασθέντες ἐν ἀγάπῃ καὶ εἰς πᾶν πλοῦτος τῆς πληροφορίας τῆς συνέσεως εἰς ἐπίγνωσιν τοῦ μυστηρίου τοῦ Θεοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: I work so that their hearts may be encouraged by being brought together in love and into all the riches of full assurance of understanding, into the knowledge of the mystery of God, that is, Christ.
verse.residue: I work so that their may be by being brought together in and into all the riches of full assurance of , into the of the of , that is, .

verse.name: Colossians 2:3
verse.Greek: ἐν ᾧ εἰσιν πάντες οἱ θησαυροὶ τῆς σοφίας καὶ γνώσεως ἀπόκρυφοι
verse.ULB: In him all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge are hidden.
verse.residue: In him all the treasures of and are hidden.

verse.name: Colossians 2:4
verse.Greek: Τοῦτο λέγω ἵνα μηδεὶς ὑμᾶς παραλογίζηται ἐν πιθανολογίᾳ
verse.ULB: I say this so that no one may trick you with persuasive speech.
verse.residue: I say this so that no one may you with persuasive speech.

verse.name: Colossians 2:5
verse.Greek: εἰ γὰρ καὶ τῇ σαρκὶ ἄπειμι ἀλλὰ τῷ πνεύματι σὺν ὑμῖν εἰμι χαίρων καὶ βλέπων ὑμῶν τὴν τάξιν καὶ τὸ στερέωμα τῆς εἰς Χριστὸν πίστεως ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: Although I am not with you in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit. I rejoice to see your good order and the strength of your faith in Christ.
verse.residue: Although I am not with you in the , yet I am with you in . I to see your good order and the of your .

verse.name: Colossians 2:6
verse.Greek: Ὡς οὖν παρελάβετε τὸν Χριστὸν Ἰησοῦν τὸν Κύριον ἐν αὐτῷ περιπατεῖτε
verse.ULB: As you received Christ Jesus the Lord, walk in him.
verse.residue: As you the Lord, .

verse.name: Colossians 2:7
verse.Greek: ἐρριζωμένοι καὶ ἐποικοδομούμενοι ἐν αὐτῷ καὶ βεβαιούμενοι τῇ πίστει καθὼς ἐδιδάχθητε περισσεύοντες ἐν εὐχαριστίᾳ
verse.ULB: Be rooted in him, be built on him, be established in faith just as you were taught, and abound in thanksgiving.
verse.residue: Be rooted in him, be built on him, be in you were , and in thanksgiving.

verse.name: Colossians 2:8
verse.Greek: Βλέπετε μή τις ὑμᾶς ἔσται ὁ συλαγωγῶν διὰ τῆς φιλοσοφίας καὶ κενῆς ἀπάτης κατὰ τὴν παράδοσιν τῶν ἀνθρώπων κατὰ τὰ στοιχεῖα τοῦ κόσμου καὶ οὐ κατὰ Χριστόν
verse.ULB: See that no one captures you through philosophy and empty deceit, according to the tradition of men, conforming to the elemental spirits of the world, and not conforming to Christ.
verse.residue: See that no one captures you through philosophy and empty , according to the of men, conforming to the elemental spirits of the , and not conforming to .

verse.name: Colossians 2:9
verse.Greek: ὅτι ἐν αὐτῷ κατοικεῖ πᾶν τὸ πλήρωμα τῆς Θεότητος σωματικῶς
verse.ULB: For in him all the fullness of God lives in bodily form.
verse.residue: For in him all the fullness of lives in bodily form.

verse.name: Colossians 2:10
verse.Greek: καὶ ἐστὲ ἐν αὐτῷ πεπληρωμένοι ὅς ἐστιν ἡ κεφαλὴ πάσης ἀρχῆς καὶ ἐξουσίας
verse.ULB: You have been filled in him, who is the head over every ruler and authority.
verse.residue: You have been filled in him, who is the over every and .

verse.name: Colossians 2:11
verse.Greek: ἐν ᾧ καὶ περιετμήθητε περιτομῇ ἀχειροποιήτῳ ἐν τῇ ἀπεκδύσει τοῦ σώματος τῆς σαρκός ἐν τῇ περιτομῇ τοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: In him you were also circumcised with a circumcision not done by humans in the removal of the body of flesh, but in the circumcision of Christ.
verse.residue: In him you were also with a not done by in the removal of the of flesh, but in the of .

verse.name: Colossians 2:12
verse.Greek: συνταφέντες αὐτῷ ἐν τῷ βαπτισμῷ ἐν ᾧ καὶ συνηγέρθητε διὰ τῆς πίστεως τῆς ἐνεργείας τοῦ Θεοῦ τοῦ ἐγείραντος αὐτὸν ἐκ νεκρῶν
verse.ULB: You were buried with him in baptism, and in him you were raised up through faith in the power of God, who raised him from the dead.
verse.residue: You were with him in baptism, and in him you were up through in the power of , who him from the .

verse.name: Colossians 2:13
verse.Greek: Καὶ ὑμᾶς νεκροὺς ὄντας ἐν τοῖς παραπτώμασιν καὶ τῇ ἀκροβυστίᾳ τῆς σαρκὸς ὑμῶν συνεζωοποίησεν ὑμᾶς σὺν αὐτῷ χαρισάμενος ἡμῖν πάντα τὰ παραπτώματα
verse.ULB: When you were dead in your trespasses and in the uncircumcision of your flesh, he made you alive together with him and forgave us all of our trespasses. \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa and forgave you all of your trespasses \fqa* . \f*
verse.residue: When you were in your and in the of your , he made you together with him and us all of our .
verse.usfm: \f + \ft Some ancient Greek copies read, \fqa and forgave you all of your trespasses \fqa* . \f*

verse.name: Colossians 2:14
verse.Greek: ἐξαλείψας τὸ καθ᾽ ἡμῶν χειρόγραφον τοῖς δόγμασιν ὃ ἦν ὑπεναντίον ἡμῖν καὶ αὐτὸ ἦρκεν ἐκ τοῦ μέσου προσηλώσας αὐτὸ τῷ σταυρῷ
verse.ULB: He blotted out the written record of debts that was hostile to us with its regulations. He took it away by nailing it to the cross.
verse.residue: He the written record of debts that was to us with its regulations. He took it away by nailing it to the .

verse.name: Colossians 2:15
verse.Greek: ἀπεκδυσάμενος τὰς ἀρχὰς καὶ τὰς ἐξουσίας ἐδειγμάτισεν ἐν παρρησίᾳ θριαμβεύσας αὐτοὺς ἐν αὐτῷ
verse.ULB: He disarmed the rulers and authorities and made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them by the cross.
verse.residue: He disarmed the and and made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them by the cross.

verse.name: Colossians 2:16
verse.Greek: Μὴ οὖν τις ὑμᾶς κρινέτω ἐν βρώσει καὶ ἐν πόσει ἢ ἐν μέρει ἑορτῆς ἢ νεομηνίας ἢ σαββάτων
verse.ULB: So then, let no one judge you in eating or in drinking, or about a festival or a new moon, or about Sabbath days.
verse.residue: So then, let no one you in eating or in drinking, or about a or a , or about days.

verse.name: Colossians 2:17
verse.Greek: ἅ ἐστιν σκιὰ τῶν μελλόντων τὸ δὲ σῶμα τοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: These are a shadow of the things to come, but the substance is Christ.
verse.residue: These are a of the things to come, but the substance is .

verse.name: Colossians 2:18
verse.Greek: μηδεὶς ὑμᾶς καταβραβευέτω θέλων ἐν ταπεινοφροσύνῃ καὶ θρησκείᾳ τῶν ἀγγέλων ἃ ἑόρακεν ἐμβατεύων εἰκῇ φυσιούμενος ὑπὸ τοῦ νοὸς τῆς σαρκὸς αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: Let no one who wants humility and the worship of angels judge you out of your prize. Such a person enters into the things he has seen and becomes puffed up for no reason by his fleshly thinking.
verse.residue: Let no one who wants and the of judge you out of your . Such a person enters into the things he has seen and becomes by his thinking.

verse.name: Colossians 2:19
verse.Greek: καὶ οὐ κρατῶν τὴν Κεφαλήν ἐξ οὗ πᾶν τὸ σῶμα διὰ τῶν ἁφῶν καὶ συνδέσμων ἐπιχορηγούμενον καὶ συμβιβαζόμενον αὔξει τὴν αὔξησιν τοῦ Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: He does not hold on to the head. It is from the head that the whole body throughout its joints and ligaments is supplied and held together; it grows with the growth given by God.
verse.residue: He does not hold on to the . It is from the head that the whole throughout its joints and ligaments is supplied and held together; it grows with the growth given by .

verse.name: Colossians 2:20
verse.Greek: Εἰ ἀπεθάνετε σὺν Χριστῷ ἀπὸ τῶν στοιχείων τοῦ κόσμου τί ὡς ζῶντες ἐν κόσμῳ δογματίζεσθε
verse.ULB: If you died together with Christ to the elemental spirits of the world, why do you live as obligated to the world:

verse.name: Colossians 2:21

verse.name: Colossians 2:22

verse.ULB: All these things will perish with use, according to the commandments and teachings of men.
verse.residue: All these things will with use, according to the and of men.

verse.name: Colossians 2:23
verse.Greek: ἅτινά ἐστιν λόγον μὲν ἔχοντα σοφίας ἐν ἐθελοθρησκίᾳ καὶ ταπεινοφροσύνῃ καὶ ἀφειδίᾳ σώματος οὐκ ἐν τιμῇ τινι πρὸς πλησμονὴν τῆς σαρκός
verse.ULB: These rules have the appearance of wisdom, with their self-made religion and humility and severe treatment of the body. But they have no value against the indulgence of the flesh.
verse.residue: These rules have the appearance of , with their self-made religion and and severe treatment of the . But they have no value against the indulgence of the .

verse.name: Colossians 3:1
verse.Greek: Εἰ οὖν συνηγέρθητε τῷ Χριστῷ τὰ ἄνω ζητεῖτε οὗ ὁ Χριστός ἐστιν ἐν δεξιᾷ τοῦ Θεοῦ καθήμενος
verse.ULB: If then God has raised you with Christ, seek the things above, where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God.
verse.residue: If then has you with , the things above, where is sitting at the of God.

verse.name: Colossians 3:2
verse.Greek: τὰ ἄνω φρονεῖτε μὴ τὰ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς
verse.ULB: Think about the things above, not about the things on earth.
verse.residue: Think about the things above, not about the things on .

verse.name: Colossians 3:3
verse.Greek: ἀπεθάνετε γάρ καὶ ἡ ζωὴ ὑμῶν κέκρυπται σὺν τῷ Χριστῷ ἐν τῷ Θεῷ
verse.ULB: For you have died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

verse.name: Colossians 3:4
verse.Greek: ὅταν ὁ Χριστὸς φανερωθῇ ἡ ζωὴ ὑμῶν τότε καὶ ὑμεῖς σὺν αὐτῷ φανερωθήσεσθε ἐν δόξῃ

verse.name: Colossians 3:5
verse.Greek: Νεκρώσατε οὖν τὰ μέλη τὰ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς πορνείαν ἀκαθαρσίαν πάθος ἐπιθυμίαν κακήν καὶ τὴν πλεονεξίαν ἥτις ἐστὶν εἰδωλολατρία

verse.name: Colossians 3:6
verse.Greek: δι᾽ ἃ ἔρχεται ἡ ὀργὴ τοῦ Θεοῦ ἐπὶ τοὺς υἱοὺς τῆς ἀπειθείας

verse.name: Colossians 3:7
verse.Greek: ἐν οἷς καὶ ὑμεῖς περιεπατήσατέ ποτε ὅτε ἐζῆτε ἐν τούτοις
verse.ULB: It is in these things that you also once walked when you lived in them.
verse.residue: It is in these things that you also once when you in them.

verse.name: Colossians 3:8
verse.Greek: νυνὶ δὲ ἀπόθεσθε καὶ ὑμεῖς τὰ πάντα ὀργήν θυμόν κακίαν βλασφημίαν αἰσχρολογίαν ἐκ τοῦ στόματος ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: But now you must get rid of all these things—wrath, anger, evil intentions, slander, and obscene speech from your mouth.
verse.residue: But now you must get rid of all these things— , , intentions, , and obscene speech from your mouth.

verse.name: Colossians 3:9
verse.Greek: Μὴ ψεύδεσθε εἰς ἀλλήλους ἀπεκδυσάμενοι τὸν παλαιὸν ἄνθρωπον σὺν ταῖς πράξεσιν αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: Do not lie to one another, since you have taken off the old man with its practices,
verse.residue: Do not lie to one another, since you have taken off the old man with its practices,

verse.name: Colossians 3:10
verse.Greek: καὶ ἐνδυσάμενοι τὸν νέον τὸν ἀνακαινούμενον εἰς ἐπίγνωσιν κατ᾽ εἰκόνα τοῦ κτίσαντος αὐτόν
verse.ULB: and you have put on the new man that is being made new in knowledge according to the image of the one who created it,
verse.residue: and you have the new man that is being made new in the image of the one who it,

verse.name: Colossians 3:11
verse.Greek: ὅπου οὐκ ἔνι Ἕλλην καὶ Ἰουδαῖος περιτομὴ καὶ ἀκροβυστία βάρβαρος Σκύθης δοῦλος ἐλεύθερος ἀλλὰ τὰ πάντα καὶ ἐν πᾶσιν Χριστός

verse.residue: where there is no or , or , , Scythian, , , but is all, and is in all.

verse.name: Colossians 3:12
verse.Greek: Ἐνδύσασθε οὖν ὡς ἐκλεκτοὶ τοῦ Θεοῦ ἅγιοι καὶ ἠγαπημένοι σπλάγχνα οἰκτιρμοῦ χρηστότητα ταπεινοφροσύνην πραΰτητα μακροθυμίαν
verse.ULB: Therefore, as God's chosen ones, holy and beloved, put on a heart of mercy, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience.
verse.residue: Therefore, as , and , a heart of , , , , and .

verse.name: Colossians 3:13
verse.Greek: ἀνεχόμενοι ἀλλήλων καὶ χαριζόμενοι ἑαυτοῖς ἐάν τις πρός τινα ἔχῃ μομφήν καθὼς καὶ ὁ Κύριος ἐχαρίσατο ὑμῖν οὕτως καὶ ὑμεῖς
verse.ULB: Bear with one another. Be gracious to each other. If someone has a complaint against someone else, forgive in the same way that the Lord has forgiven you.
verse.residue: Bear with one another. Be gracious to each other. If someone has a complaint against someone else, that the has you.

verse.name: Colossians 3:14
verse.Greek: ἐπὶ πᾶσιν δὲ τούτοις τὴν ἀγάπην ὅ ἐστιν σύνδεσμος τῆς τελειότητος
verse.ULB: Above all these things, have love, which is the bond of perfection.
verse.residue: Above all these things, have , which is the of .

verse.name: Colossians 3:15
verse.Greek: καὶ ἡ εἰρήνη τοῦ Χριστοῦ βραβευέτω ἐν ταῖς καρδίαις ὑμῶν εἰς ἣν καὶ ἐκλήθητε ἐν ἑνὶ σώματι καὶ εὐχάριστοι γίνεσθε
verse.ULB: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts. It was for this peace that you were called in one body. And be thankful.

verse.name: Colossians 3:16
verse.Greek: Ὁ λόγος τοῦ Χριστοῦ ἐνοικείτω ἐν ὑμῖν πλουσίως ἐν πάσῃ σοφίᾳ διδάσκοντες καὶ νουθετοῦντες ἑαυτοὺς ψαλμοῖς ὕμνοις ᾠδαῖς πνευματικαῖς ἐν τῇ χάριτι ᾄδοντες ἐν ταῖς καρδίαις ὑμῶν τῷ Θεῷ
verse.ULB: Let the word of Christ live in you richly, teaching and instructing one another with all wisdom, singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs with thankfulness in your hearts to God.
verse.residue: Let the of live in you richly, teaching and one another with all , singing and hymns and songs with thankfulness in your to .

verse.name: Colossians 3:17
verse.Greek: καὶ πᾶν ὅ τι ἐὰν ποιῆτε ἐν λόγῳ ἢ ἐν ἔργῳ πάντα ἐν ὀνόματι Κυρίου Ἰησοῦ εὐχαριστοῦντες τῷ Θεῷ Πατρὶ δι᾽ αὐτοῦ
verse.ULB: Whatever you do, in word or in deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus. Give thanks to God the Father through him.
verse.residue: Whatever you do, in or in , do all in the of the . Give thanks to the through him.

verse.name: Colossians 3:18
verse.Greek: Αἱ γυναῖκες ὑποτάσσεσθε τοῖς ἀνδράσιν ὡς ἀνῆκεν ἐν Κυρίῳ
verse.ULB: Wives, submit to your husbands, as it is appropriate in the Lord.
verse.residue: Wives, to your husbands, as it is appropriate .

verse.name: Colossians 3:19
verse.Greek: Οἱ ἄνδρες ἀγαπᾶτε τὰς γυναῖκας καὶ μὴ πικραίνεσθε πρὸς αὐτάς
verse.ULB: Husbands, love your wives, and do not be bitter against them.
verse.residue: Husbands, your wives, and do not be bitter against them.

verse.name: Colossians 3:20
verse.Greek: Τὰ τέκνα ὑπακούετε τοῖς γονεῦσιν κατὰ πάντα τοῦτο γὰρ εὐάρεστόν ἐστιν ἐν Κυρίῳ
verse.ULB: Children, obey your parents in all things, for this is pleasing in the Lord..
verse.residue: Children, your parents in all things, for this is pleasing .

verse.name: Colossians 3:21
verse.Greek: Οἱ πατέρες μὴ ἐρεθίζετε τὰ τέκνα ὑμῶν ἵνα μὴ ἀθυμῶσιν
verse.ULB: Fathers, do not provoke your children, so that they will not be discouraged.
verse.residue: Fathers, do not your , so that they will not be discouraged.

verse.name: Colossians 3:22
verse.Greek: Οἱ δοῦλοι ὑπακούετε κατὰ πάντα τοῖς κατὰ σάρκα κυρίοις μὴ ἐν ὀφθαλμοδουλίαις ὡς ἀνθρωπάρεσκοι ἀλλ᾽ ἐν ἁπλότητι καρδίας φοβούμενοι τὸν Κύριον
verse.ULB: Slaves, obey your masters according to the flesh in all things, not with eye-service, as people-pleasers, but with a sincere heart. Fear the Lord.
verse.residue: Slaves, your according to the in all things, not with eye- , as people-pleasers, but with a sincere . Fear the .

verse.name: Colossians 3:23
verse.Greek: Ὃ ἐὰν ποιῆτε ἐκ ψυχῆς ἐργάζεσθε ὡς τῷ Κυρίῳ καὶ οὐκ ἀνθρώποις
verse.ULB: Whatever you do, work from the soul as to the Lord and not as to people.
verse.residue: Whatever you do, from the as to the and not as to people.

verse.name: Colossians 3:24
verse.Greek: εἰδότες ὅτι ἀπὸ Κυρίου ἀπολήμψεσθε τὴν ἀνταπόδοσιν τῆς κληρονομίας τῷ Κυρίῳ Χριστῷ δουλεύετε
verse.ULB: You know that you will receive from the Lord the reward of the inheritance. It is the Lord Christ whom you serve.
verse.residue: You that you will from the the of the . It is the whom you .

verse.name: Colossians 3:25
verse.Greek: ὁ γὰρ ἀδικῶν κομίσεται ὃ ἠδίκησεν καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν προσωπολημψία
verse.ULB: For anyone who does unrighteousness will receive the penalty for the unrighteousness that he did, and there is no partiality.
verse.residue: For anyone who does unrighteousness will the penalty for the unrighteousness that he did, and there is no .

verse.name: Colossians 4:1
verse.Greek: Οἱ κύριοι τὸ δίκαιον καὶ τὴν ἰσότητα τοῖς δούλοις παρέχεσθε εἰδότες ὅτι καὶ ὑμεῖς ἔχετε Κύριον ἐν οὐρανῷ
verse.ULB: Masters, give to slaves what is right and fair, knowing you also have a master in heaven.
verse.residue: Masters, give to and fair, ı you also have a in heaven.

verse.name: Colossians 4:2
verse.Greek: Τῇ προσευχῇ προσκαρτερεῖτε γρηγοροῦντες ἐν αὐτῇ ἐν εὐχαριστίᾳ
verse.ULB: Continue steadfastly in prayer. Stay alert in it in thanksgiving.
verse.residue: Continue steadfastly in . Stay alert in it in thanksgiving.

verse.name: Colossians 4:3
verse.Greek: προσευχόμενοι ἅμα καὶ περὶ ἡμῶν ἵνα ὁ Θεὸς ἀνοίξῃ ἡμῖν θύραν τοῦ λόγου λαλῆσαι τὸ μυστήριον τοῦ Χριστοῦ δι᾽ ὃ καὶ δέδεμαι
verse.ULB: Pray together for us also, that God would open a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ. Because of this, I am chained up.
verse.residue: Pray together for us also, that would open a door for the , to speak the of . Because of this, I am up.

verse.name: Colossians 4:4
verse.Greek: ἵνα φανερώσω αὐτὸ ὡς δεῖ με λαλῆσαι
verse.ULB: Pray that I may make it clear, as I ought to speak.
verse.residue: Pray that I may make it clear, as I ought to speak.

verse.name: Colossians 4:5
verse.Greek: Ἐν σοφίᾳ περιπατεῖτε πρὸς τοὺς ἔξω τὸν καιρὸν ἐξαγοραζόμενοι
verse.ULB: Walk in wisdom toward those outside, and redeem the time.
verse.residue: Walk in toward those outside, and the .

verse.name: Colossians 4:6
verse.Greek: ὁ λόγος ὑμῶν πάντοτε ἐν χάριτι ἅλατι ἠρτυμένος εἰδέναι πῶς δεῖ ὑμᾶς ἑνὶ ἑκάστῳ ἀποκρίνεσθαι
verse.ULB: Let your words always be with grace. Let them be seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you should answer each person.
verse.residue: Let your always be with . Let them be seasoned with salt, so that you may how you should answer each person.

verse.name: Colossians 4:7
verse.Greek: Τὰ κατ᾽ ἐμὲ πάντα γνωρίσει ὑμῖν Τυχικὸς ὁ ἀγαπητὸς ἀδελφὸς καὶ πιστὸς διάκονος καὶ σύνδουλος ἐν Κυρίῳ
verse.ULB: As for the things concerning me, Tychicus will make them known to you. He is a beloved brother, a faithful servant, and fellow slave in the Lord.
verse.residue: As for the things concerning me, will them to you. He is a , a , and fellow slave .

verse.name: Colossians 4:8
verse.Greek: ὃν ἔπεμψα πρὸς ὑμᾶς εἰς αὐτὸ τοῦτο ἵνα γνῶτε τὰ περὶ ἡμῶν καὶ παρακαλέσῃ τὰς καρδίας ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: I have sent him to you for this, that you might know the matters about us, and so that he may encourage your hearts. \f + \ft There are some important and ancient Greek copies, along with some ancient translations of the Greek that read, \fqa I sent him to you for this, that he might know the matters about you, and that he may encourage your hearts \fqa* . \f*
verse.residue: I have him to you for this, that you might the matters about us, and so that he may your .

verse.name: Colossians 4:9
verse.Greek: σὺν Ὀνησίμῳ τῷ πιστῷ καὶ ἀγαπητῷ ἀδελφῷ ὅς ἐστιν ἐξ ὑμῶν πάντα ὑμῖν γνωρίσουσιν τὰ ὧδε
verse.ULB: I have sent him together with Onesimus, the faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They will make known to you everything that has happened here.
verse.residue: I have sent him together with Onesimus, the and , who is one of you. They will to you everything that has happened here.

verse.name: Colossians 4:10
verse.Greek: Ἀσπάζεται ὑμᾶς Ἀρίσταρχος ὁ συναιχμάλωτός μου καὶ Μᾶρκος ὁ ἀνεψιὸς Βαρνάβα περὶ οὗ ἐλάβετε ἐντολάς ἐὰν ἔλθῃ πρὸς ὑμᾶς δέξασθε αὐτόν
verse.ULB: Aristarchus, my fellow prisoner, greets you, as well as Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (about whom you received orders; if he comes to you, receive him),
verse.residue: Aristarchus, my fellow , you, as well as , the cousin of (about whom you ; if he comes to you, him),

verse.name: Colossians 4:11
verse.Greek: καὶ Ἰησοῦς ὁ λεγόμενος Ἰοῦστος οἱ ὄντες ἐκ περιτομῆς οὗτοι μόνοι συνεργοὶ εἰς τὴν βασιλείαν τοῦ Θεοῦ οἵτινες ἐγενήθησάν μοι παρηγορία
verse.ULB: and also Jesus who is called Justus. These alone of the circumcision are my fellow workers for the kingdom of God. They have been a comfort to me.
verse.residue: and also who is Justus. These alone of the are my for the . They have been a to me.

verse.name: Colossians 4:12
verse.Greek: Ἀσπάζεται ὑμᾶς Ἐπαφρᾶς ὁ ἐξ ὑμῶν δοῦλος Χριστοῦ Ἰησοῦ πάντοτε ἀγωνιζόμενος ὑπὲρ ὑμῶν ἐν ταῖς προσευχαῖς ἵνα σταθῆτε τέλειοι καὶ πεπληροφορημένοι ἐν παντὶ θελήματι τοῦ Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: Epaphras greets you. He is one of you and a slave of Christ Jesus. He always strives for you in prayer, so that you may stand complete and fully assured in all the will of God.
verse.residue: Epaphras you. He is one of you and a of . He always for you in , so that you may stand complete and in all the .

verse.name: Colossians 4:13
verse.Greek: μαρτυρῶ γὰρ αὐτῷ ὅτι ἔχει πολὺν πόνον ὑπὲρ ὑμῶν καὶ τῶν ἐν Λαοδικείᾳ καὶ τῶν ἐν Ἱεραπόλει
verse.ULB: For I can testify that he works hard for you, for those in Laodicea, and for those in Hierapolis.
verse.residue: For I can that he works for you, for those in Laodicea, and for those in Hierapolis.

verse.name: Colossians 4:14
verse.Greek: Ἀσπάζεται ὑμᾶς Λουκᾶς ὁ ἰατρὸς ὁ ἀγαπητὸς καὶ Δημᾶς
verse.ULB: Luke the beloved physician and Demas greet you.
verse.residue: the physician and Demas you.

verse.name: Colossians 4:15
verse.Greek: Ἀσπάσασθε τοὺς ἐν Λαοδικείᾳ ἀδελφοὺς καὶ Νύμφαν καὶ τὴν κατ᾽ οἶκον αὐτῆς ἐκκλησίαν
verse.ULB: Greet the brothers in Laodicea, and Nympha, and the church that is in her house.
verse.residue: Greet the in Laodicea, and Nympha, and the that is in her .

verse.name: Colossians 4:16
verse.Greek: Καὶ ὅταν ἀναγνωσθῇ παρ᾽ ὑμῖν ἡ ἐπιστολή ποιήσατε ἵνα καὶ ἐν τῇ Λαοδικέων ἐκκλησίᾳ ἀναγνωσθῇ καὶ τὴν ἐκ Λαοδικείας ἵνα καὶ ὑμεῖς ἀναγνῶτε
verse.ULB: When this letter has been read among you, have it read also in the church of the Laodiceans, and see that you also read the letter from Laodicea.
verse.residue: When this has been read among you, have it read also in the of the Laodiceans, and see that you also read the letter from Laodicea.

verse.name: Colossians 4:17
verse.Greek: Καὶ εἴπατε Ἀρχίππῳ Βλέπε τὴν διακονίαν ἣν παρέλαβες ἐν Κυρίῳ ἵνα αὐτὴν πληροῖς
verse.ULB: Say to Archippus, "Look to the ministry that you have received in the Lord, that you should fulfill it."
verse.residue: Say to Archippus, "Look to the that you have , that you should it."

verse.name: Colossians 4:18
verse.Greek: Ὁ ἀσπασμὸς τῇ ἐμῇ χειρὶ Παύλου Μνημονεύετέ μου τῶν δεσμῶν Ἡ χάρις μεθ᾽ ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: This greeting is with my own hand—Paul. Remember my chains. May grace be with you.
verse.residue: This greeting is with my own — . Remember my . May be with you.
